Room.Name: Delaney Drive/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Delaney Drive and Hofton Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Hofton Avenue runs east and west from the intersection, running parallel to the north City Walls. Delaney Road is a short street running south from Hofton Avenue between the Oceancrest Municiple Library and the Oceancrest City Guard Barracks.
